titulo: Asesor/a call center - Trilingual Reps Work from home.
descripcion:
• USA BPO company hiring Trilingual Reps - Work from home.

    PowerOffice is looking to fill a few positions for our healthcare client In the USA. The job will entail coordinating between patients and healthcare caregivers.

    Candidate must

    - speak English, Creole and Spanish

    - Solid communication skills

    - Critical thinking

    - Ability to perform under stress

    - Great problem solving skills

    Candidate must be located in Santo Domingo and Live in a place with good Internet with reliable power.

    We are offering above market pay for the right candidates.

    To apply, respond with your resume and contact information.
